description:
Kid Summers has two Weavile but they are indistinguishable from each other as there are no distinguishing marks on either of them. One of the Weavile`s was first seen in the Aldoran castle Hero of the Wave festival battle tournament but it lost to Ash in the final round.
Kid Summers uses her Weavile`s to assist her in her missions. At Aldoran castle, their job was to place a locator tag on Mew but they were unsuccessful as Pikachu was able to delay them until Mew transported away.
name: Manyula (Kid Summers)
